attributes.action: increase the number of overnight banking windows to get out of credit crunch
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: increase the number of overnight banking windows from the present 3 at eight hours each  to 4 at 6 hrs each and later to 6 at  4 hrs to get out of the credit crunch instead of bailing out the banks. The system can be used to max of 24 windows at 1 hour each.
